description: This file defines a Toolkit class used for managing a collection of tools/functions, including registration, filtering, and configuration options. It is part of a larger project related to tool management within an AI or automation framework.

classes.name: Toolkit
classes.description: A class for managing a collection of tools/functions, including registration, filtering, and configuration.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Initializes a Toolkit instance with various configuration options and automatically registers tools if auto_register is enabled.

methods.name: _check_tools_filters
methods.description: Checks the validity of include and exclude tool filters and logs warnings for missing required tools.

methods.name: _register_tools
methods.description: Registers all tools in the toolkit.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Registers a single function as a tool in the toolkit, with optional custom naming and configuration.

methods.name: __repr__
methods.description: Returns a string representation of the Toolkit instance.

methods.name: __str__
methods.description: Returns a string representation of the Toolkit instance.
